languages.text: Температура неумолимо падает, но отважные блюстители, взяв пример с Лорд-капитана, стойко встретили это испытание и не пали духом.
The temperature inexorably plummets, but the brave enforcers, following the Lord Captain's example, staunchly endure the trial and do not lose heart.
languages.original_text: Температура неумолимо падает, но отважные блюстители, взяв пример с Лорд-капитана, стойко встретили это испытание и не пали духом.

traits.locale_text: The temperature inexorably plummets, but the brave enforcers, following the Lord Captain's example, staunchly endure the trial and do not lose heart.
The temperature inexorably plummets, but the brave enforcers, following the Lord Captain's example, staunchly endure the trial and do not lose heart.
The temperature inexorably plummets, but the brave enforcers, following the Lord Captain's example, staunchly endure the trial and do not lose heart.
The temperature inexorably plummets, but the brave enforcers, following the Lord Captain's example, staunchly endure the trial and do not lose heart.

languages.text: 气温无情地骤降，但勇敢的士兵们以舰长大人为榜样，顽强地经受住了考验，没有气馁。
languages.original_text: The temperature inexorably plummets, but the brave enforcers, following the Lord Captain's example, staunchly endure the trial and do not lose heart.

traits.locale_text: 气温无情地骤降，但勇敢的士兵们以舰长大人为榜样，顽强地经受住了考验，没有气馁。

languages.text: 気温は容赦なく下がっていくが、ロード・キャプテンを模範に続けと勇敢なエンフォーサーはこの試練に断固として耐え、心折れることはない。
languages.original_text: The temperature inexorably plummets, but the brave enforcers, following the Lord Captain's example, staunchly endure the trial and do not lose heart.

traits.locale_text: 気温は容赦なく下がっていくが、ロード・キャプテンを模範に続けと勇敢なエンフォーサーはこの試練に断固として耐え、心折れることはない。

languages.text: La temperatura desciende inexorablemente, pero el personal de seguridad, siguiendo el ejemplo {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán, atraviesan la prueba con dignidad y sin perder el ánimo.
languages.original_text: The temperature inexorably plummets, but the brave enforcers, following the Lord Captain's example, staunchly endure the trial and do not lose heart.

traits.locale_text: La temperatura desciende inexorablemente, pero el personal de seguridad, siguiendo el ejemplo {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán, atraviesan la prueba con dignidad y sin perder el ánimo.

languages.text: La température s'effondre inexorablement, mais les courageux prévôts, prenant exemple sur {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, supportent l'épreuve sans se décourager.
languages.original_text: The temperature inexorably plummets, but the brave enforcers, following the Lord Captain's example, staunchly endure the trial and do not lose heart.

traits.locale_text: La température s'effondre inexorablement, mais les courageux prévôts, prenant exemple sur {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, supportent l'épreuve sans se décourager.

languages.text: Die Temperatur sinkt unweigerlich, aber die tapferen Enforcers folgen dem Beispiel des Lord Captain, ertragen diese Prüfung und verzagen nicht.
languages.original_text: The temperature inexorably plummets, but the brave enforcers, following the Lord Captain's example, staunchly endure the trial and do not lose heart.

traits.locale_text: Die Temperatur sinkt unweigerlich, aber die tapferen Enforcers folgen dem Beispiel des Lord Captain, ertragen diese Prüfung und verzagen nicht.

languages.text: Sıcaklık aniden düşse de Lord Kaptan'ı örnek alarak sadakatle imtihanlarına göğüs geren Cesur infazcılar, ümitsizliğe kapılmıyor.
languages.original_text: The temperature inexorably plummets, but the brave enforcers, following the Lord Captain's example, staunchly endure the trial and do not lose heart.

traits.locale_text: Sıcaklık aniden düşmüştü ama cesur infazcılar, Lord Kaptan'ı örnek alarak sadık bir biçimde imtihanlarına göğüs gerdi ve ümitlerini kaybetmediler.
